buttons.addGamePlaceholder: Add a game "{title}" to your library

home.description1: Free and open source library manager for all your games.
home.description2: All data is saved locally in your browser, without any cookies or trackers.
home.description3: Organize your library and games with ease.
home.title: Backlog.rip

messages.libraryEmptySubtitle:
You don't have any games in your library.
Try importing your Steam games or add any game you want from games page.
messages.nothingFoundSubtitle:
We couldn't find any results matching your search criteria.
Try to change your search query or filters.
messages.noGamesFound: We haven't found any games for the current search

pages.welcomeParagraph1: With Backlog.rip you can organize, keep track of your progress and have a single place for all your games.
pages.welcomeParagraph2: All data is stored in your browser, you own it and you can export, import and modify it at any time.
pages.welcomeParagraph3: With zero ads, zero tracking and zero bullshit, you can be sure that your data is safe.
pages.welcomeParagraph4: You can automatically import your library from Steam (Public profiles), with more to come.
pages.welcomeParagraph5: Everything you do is recorded automatically in your journal. But you can add your own notes too.
pages.welcomeParagraph6: You can manually add any games to your Backlog, even if you don't have them in any library. Then, you can add a state to any game to keep track of your progress.
pages.welcomeParagraph7: You start with 7 states, but you can modify them to fit your needs.
pages.createYourOwnGameSubtitle: You can just create a game for yourself.

placeholders.searchCommand: Search for a game, genre, or command...

tooltips.randomGame: Get a random game from this list

messages.dataNotFoundSubtitle: Sorry, we couldn't find the data you're looking for.
